entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add 2 more constructors to ConcurrentDictionary class #77948
  • MONO_WASM: Error in mono_download_assets: RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #77946
  • Stopwatch.GetTimestamp() doesn't take into account sleep time on Unix #77945
  • GetAllNetworkInterfaces throws on Success on Android .NET 6 #77938
  • [API Proposal]: JsonSerializerOptions.UseZeroByteReads #77935

Closed

  • CI build failure: mono llvmfullaot linux x64 - No output #77403
  • Vector128.AndNot is broken #77942
    8.0.0
  • DllImport in Linux, can't call native function when so library is compile in '-fPIC' option. #77941
  • Rename Directory.CreateDirectory to Directory.Create to be consistent with File API #77919
  • Idea: throw when an ILGenerator.Emit method overload is used with an invalid opcode. #40620
    Future
  • Possible optimization opportunity of integer multiplication by constant #75119
    Future
  • SuperFileCheck causes runtime.linux-x64.Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.JIT.Tools prebuilt in source builds #77920
  • Consider extending the functionality of the PEReader class #35691
    Future
  • MetadataReader.GetMethodDefinition throws `BadImageFormatException` -- should potentially return null on failure? #48167
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix sprintf deprecation error with Xcode 14.1 #77950
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't use IsMatchingConst in Tier0 #77949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize String.Equals for OrdinalIgnoreCase #77947
    area-System.Globalization
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • DNER multi-reg locals early if they cannot be enregistered #77943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [corlib] Move System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper to the shared partition #77939
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Update repository URL in package.json #77937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Correctly handle false on Add/Take from underlying collection in BlockingCollection #77936
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable software writewatch and card bundles on Windows. #77934
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Readme.md for Resources, Threading.Tasks, Threading.Channels, ComilerServices, Configuration and CodeDom assemblies #77932
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Fix rerunning crossgen2 tests #77903
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Optimize XxHash3 on ARM platform #77881
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Switch custom attribute hash from using CClosedHashEx to SHash #77933
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.JIT.Tools for source build #77928
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Make DAC logging opt-in #77923
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the build with BACKGROUND_GC turned off #77328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix EC curve name case sensitivity on Windows #77801
    area-System.Security
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77924
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.x
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add and use a MakeSrcRegOptional that validates IsSafeToContainMem was called #77895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` and `a % -1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Optimize (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Allow deleting any kind of nodes after address mode formation #77872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AVX-512 testing pipeline #77930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy for structs and for classes with multiple constructors #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • The --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` and `dotnet watch run` should fallback to a case-insensitive match if a case-sensitive match isn't found #25868
    7.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support calling unique launch profiles with a case-insensitive nature & Improve errors around launch profiles #28908
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28905

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: `Task<T>` nullability covariance #3950
    Working Set
  • Champion: fixed-sized buffers #1314
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add notes from params improvements working group meeting 2022-11-03 #6657

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Intellisense bug: when contents of string interpolation contains newline, the final double quote is incorrectly moved #39846
    Backlog
  • Unreachable exception in `EEMethodSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences` #65165
    17.5
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33104.203 #65240

Updated

  • Codegen of System.Nullable `is null` check is poor #65091
    17.5
  • C#: The compiler should be consistent about issuing error CS1612 when modifying readonly rvalue struct #45284
    C# 12.0
  • Missing CS8970 when applying attribute alias with unsupported type substitution #58836
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup on save while resolving merge conflicts #60818
    17.4
  • Attribute properties are not suggested for local methods #64905
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable navigate-to streaming with IAsyncEnumerable. #65244
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecesary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Re-enable all streaming services. #65241
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65242
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Implement `EEMethodSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences` #65207
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65239
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65246
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Webassembly is broken out of the box #44902
  • Blazor WebAssembly project cannot read appsettings.json file when connected with http instead of https #44900
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #44899
  • QuickGrid: Make ColumnBase.IsSortableByDefault() public. #44898
  • Blazor - Binding Blazor Component or workaround [ask from WPF guy] #44897
  • Github Actions Azure App Service Deployment Says Successful, But Nothing Deploys .Net 6.0 #44896
  • The thrown exception's message is completely useless... #44895
  • Erroneous `////` in default URL for a blazorwasm template parameter #44894
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext #44893
  • Eager load assemblies in Blazor for Roslyn compilation #44890

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #44892
  • Using SignalR Clients.All.SendAsync in a registered Middlware without disconnecting when making a request to trigger middleware. #44858
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #44885
  • Perf regression: updates #44886

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/3.1] nit: Update `$(RepositoryUrl)` #44891
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x

Merged

  • Update README.md #44888
    8.0-preview1
  • Update bug template for razor-compiler migration #44889
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Set ApiParameterDescription.Type to `string` for Simple Types #44747
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [main] Remove feeds, add to SiteExtension bundle #44882
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Remove experimental and downlevel feeds #44879
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] Remove VS feeds #44876
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2038047 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    area-runtime
  • source-build: don't use crossgen when building for mono runtime. #44842
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RadioButton IsChecked Binding does not work on iOS nor Windows #11125
  • Can't publish iOS due to: The App Store Icon in the asset catalog in 'myapp.app' can't be transparent nor contain an Alpha Channel. #11124
  • Password entry flashes and the app *crashes* #11123
  • TextCell isVisible #11120
  • AppThemeBinding not working well on macOS #11119
  • Add a NuGet packed to a project. for Android #11118
  • RadioButtonGroup view not initializing properly when multiple groups exist in a single page #11117
  • Adaptive Trigger not working NET 7 MacCatalyst #11114

Closed

  • [Critical] Command + V and more crashes the application (macOS 13) #10842
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
